summary: Second in the series of Meatball movies. A group of kids attempt to save a summer camp that's a financial failure.
cast: Richard Mulligan|Hamilton Camp|John Mengatti|Kim Richards|Archie Hahn|Misty Rowe|Ralph Seymour|Tammy Taylor|John Larroquette|Paul Reubens|Jason Hervey|David Hollander|Scott Nemes|Chad Sheets|Paul Stout|Scott Stout|Nick Ryan|Vivi Lorre|Joanne Giudici|Elayne Boosler|Nancy Glass|Patti Kirkpatrick|Milton Ingley|Jonna King|Tim Bartell|Felix Silla|Vic Dunlop|Joe Nipote|Joaquín Martínez|Blackie Dammett|Christian Brackett-Zika|Donald Gibb|Alan Bendich|Lori Randolph
title: Los albóndigas atacan de nuevo
